explanations: In the 7th-grade math curriculum, students will focus on arithmetic operations involving negative numbers, with a particular emphasis on multiplication. By multiplying negative numbers, students will deepen their understanding of mathematical concepts and build their problem-solving skills related to negative numbers.

details.choice_question:
Question: In the 7th-grade math curriculum, students will learn about arithmetic operations with negative numbers, focusing on which operation?
A) Multiplication
B) Division
C) Addition
D) Subtraction
